# Welcome to my profile ü§©üëãüèº!

<p> My name is Gustavo Ferreira, and I am 18 years old.
I graduated from a technical course alongside high school in the field of Industrial Automation, where I programmed and worked in automation environments with Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) using the Ladder programming language and maker/embedded development with the Arduino board and its programming language. </p>

## About Me

<!-- - <p> üë®‚Äçüíª I have been studying programming (systems development, website programming, etc.) for about 5 years, aiming to become a fullstack developer who can work in teams as either FrontEnd or BackEnd. </p> -->
- <p> üåü I am looking for my first professional opportunity with an interest in working with front-end development in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript ‚Äî with libraries like React, as well as back-end development focused on Java and/or JavaScript.</p>
- <p>  üîß  Additionally, I study and practice in public to contribute to open-source development, with the projects pinned on this profile. </p>
<p>

  I have been passionate about programming since I started using the internet. During my childhood and adolescence, I grew up fascinated by this world, having my first experiences "playing" with programming plugins and production environments for Minecraft servers üòÅ 
</p>

<p> I am an enthusiast of Windows and Linux-based systems; I love learning about open-source tools and technologies and also enjoy using command-line applications.</p> 

In my current setup, I run my machine with a Windows 10 system and use the WSL2 application to be able to use Linux-based systems as well.
</p>
